resources.string:
non-sectarian & non-political organization 

 working since years dedicated to spreading 

 authentic Islamic knowledge of 

 the Quran & Sunnah

NurulQuran Institute is a non-profit, non-sectarian & non-political organization working since years dedicated to spreading authentic Islamic knowledge of the Quran & Sunnah
through education & social welfare while making it easily attainable for all walks of life. Our Vision is to Enlighten the heart with the Light of the Quran.
For More Details Visit Us : NurulQuran.com NurulQuran.com
